Question
========
How do you scope a Positron setting so it applies only to the current project instead of globally?

Answerlist
----------
* Open Settings and use the Workspace tab before changing the option
* Edit the setting only after restarting Positron
* Install an extension to override global defaults
* Use the User tab to make it project specific

Solution
========
Select the Workspace tab at the top of the Settings panel; changes there apply only to the current project.

Answerlist
----------
* True
